caption: Itâ€™s a part of a movie. The theme of the movie is spy and agent. The helicopter is crashed on the snow land on the cliff. At the same time, in a room, a man is tied on the rope, and another man is trying to kill a woman. The fight against each other. The man tied on the rope helps the woman, but then he is nearly killed by the rope. Luckily, the woman finally kills the man and saves the man who is nearly killed by the rope. Two men crawled out of a crashed helicopter. They fought each other and eventually both fell off a cliff. They managed to grab onto a rope. The man above focused on a rock on the cliff, and then he forcefully pulled the rope down. The hook on the rope hit the man below, causing him to fall off the cliff.
